name: Trial By Inn
description:
Trial By Inn is a 2D Unity puzzle game created for RIT's IGME 320: Game Design II class using C#. I collaborated with 4 other students over the course of about a month to fully design and build this game from the ground up. We were given the constraint that it had to be made in to fit into a pre-existing franchise that we weren't allowed to choose: The World of Ethshar.

For this project, I developed an adaptable grid system using C# to act as the foundation for our game and tile-movement. I also designed UI, backgrounds, the mock-up box art, and other miscellaneous art assets in Clip Studio Paint.

Made by: Alessandro Fiorella, Liliana Klein, Carson Lampila. Brandon Service, and Lucas Veldman
